Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/South Shore
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted near 67th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stoney Island, 67th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 67th/South Shore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island Temporary Westbound Reroute near Blue Island
ShortDescription: Westbound 60 Blue Island buses are temp. rerouted via Blue Island, Western, Cermak, California and 26th street: due to street blockage near Blue Island/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #60 Blue Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Blue Island, Western, Cermak, California, 26th street and over regular route: due to, street blockage near Blue Island/Western.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
